column5: Beautiful, spacious, newly furnished 2b1b with additional 1 sofa bed. Accommodates up to 5 people comfortably - great for business or family/friends. Equipped with mini kitchen, fast Wifi, and jacuzzi in the backyard. • 8 min to Energy Corridor • 12 min to Memorial • 15 min to Citycenter • 25 min to the Galleria • 30 min to NRG Stadium • 30 min to Rice University • 30 min to downtown Houston • 30 min to Texas Medical Center • 30 min to Convention Center • 50 min to Space Center
